idea-plugin.name: VimMulticursor
idea-plugin.description:
A powerful IdeaVim extension that brings multiple cursor and selection capabilities through Vim commands. Use the `mc` prefix to create multiple cursors or `ms` prefix to create selections, followed by any supported Vim command. All commands will operate within the current selection if text is selected.
Supported Commands: • Navigation - mc/ + search: Add cursors at all occurrences of search regex. - mcfx/mcFx: Add cursors at all occurrences of character x. - mcw/mcW: Add cursors at next words start. - mcb/mcB: Add cursors at previous words start. - mce/mcE: Add cursors at words end.
• Around text objects with cursors - mcaw: Around word - mca + bracket: Around bracket, like `mca(`/`mcab`, `mca{`/`mcaB`, `mca"`, etc - mci + bracket: Inside bracket, like `mci(`/`mcib`, `mci{`/`mciB`, `mci"`, etc - Any bracket: mcaa/mcia (smart matching)
• Cursor Management - mcc: Add/remove a cursor highlight at current position - mcr: Convert cursor highlights to active editing cursors - mcd: Clear all cursors and highlights
Full guide: https://github.com/dankinsoid/VimMulticursor
